resources.string:
Ever had doubts in you mind if your device consists of top-notch sensors like temperature sensor, pressure sensor, barometer, or even heart rate sensor? Sense-It-All! allows you to test the presence of over 38 sensors in your device, each of which, if present, is combined with a test to let you know of its limits.

 This is a sensor test/device test application, aimed for both fun and professional purposes, targeting audience all over the world.


Sense-It-All! tests for the following sensors's presence in your device:
 1. Main Camera
 2. Secondary Camera
 3. GPS
 4. WiFi
 5. Bluetooth
 6. GSM/UMTS
 7. Accelerometer
 8. Compass
 9. Radio
 10.Screen
 11. Battery
 12. CPU
 13. Sound
 14. Vibrator
 15. Microphone
 16. USB
 17. Audio/Video Outputs
 18. Android OS
 19. Light Sensor
 20. Proximity Sensor
 21. Temperature Sensor
 22. Pressure Sensor
 23. Relative Humidity
 24. Flash
 25. Gyroscope
 26. Gravity
 27. Linear Acceleration
 28. Rotation Vector
 29. Infrared
 30. Step Detector
 31. Step Counter
 32.Motion Detector
 33. Stationary Detector
 34. MultiTouch
 35. WiFi Direct
 36. Heart Rate
 37. Fingerprint
 38. NFC
 39. Magnetic Field Sensor


The tests for the above sensors provided in the app will could be used for fun, as well as for professional purposes, thus an extremely large range of people are welcome to use this app for sensor testing, or rather broadly, device testing.
